languages.text: "Я знаю мало, но для Фабрикатор-Цензора эта машина была... особенной. И для него, и для этих безумцев, которые осквернили обитель Омниссии своей непотребной хулой! Для финального ритуала он даже призвал одного из еретиков-Астартес, что прибыли в мануфакторум после начала бунтов. Он... что-то сделал. Что-то ужасное. И только после этого они сумели включить ее".

traits.locale_text: "Я знаю мало, но для Фабрикатора эта машина была... особенной. И для него, и для этих безумцев, которые осквернили обитель Омниссии своей непотребной хулой! Для финального ритуала он даже призвал одного из еретиков-Астартес, что прибыли в мануфакторум после начала бунтов. Он... что-то сделал. Что-то ужасное. И только после этого они сумели включить ее".
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю мало, но для Фабрикатор-Цензора эта машина была... особенной. И для него, и для этих безумцев, которые осквернили обитель Омниссии своей непотребной хулой! Для финального ритуала он даже призвал одного из еретиков-Астартес, что прибыли в мануфакторум после начала бунтов. Он... что-то сделал. Что-то ужасное. И только после этого они сумели включить ее".

For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “我知道的并不多，我只知道铸造审查师认为那台机器非常……特别。无论是对他而言，还是对那些通过肮脏的亵渎行为玷污了欧姆尼塞亚居所的异端分子而言，那台机器都很特别！为了举行最后的仪式，他甚至召集了一群在叛乱之后抵达制造工厂的阿斯塔特异端分子。他……做了某些事情，某些可怕的事情。他们是在举行了那场仪式之后，才成功地打开了那台机器。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."

traits.locale_text: “我知道的并不多，我只知道铸造审查师认为那台机器非常……特别。无论是对他而言，还是对那些通过肮脏的亵渎行为玷污了欧姆尼塞亚居所的异端分子而言，那台机器都很特别！为了举行最后的仪式，他甚至召集了一群在叛乱之后抵达制造工厂的阿斯塔特异端分子。他……做了某些事情，某些可怕的事情。他们是在举行了那场仪式之后，才成功地打开了那台机器。”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «No sé mucho, solo que el fabricator-censor consideraba la máquina... especial. ¡Era importante para él y los locos que profanaron la morada del Omnissiah con sus obscenas blasfemias! Para el último ritual, llamó incluso a uno de los Astartes Herejes que llegaron al manufactorum con el comienzo de los levantamientos. Hizo... algo. Algo terrible. Y solo después de aquello pudieron activar la máquina».
languages.original_text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."

traits.locale_text: «No sé mucho, solo que el fabricator-censor consideraba la máquina... especial. ¡Era importante para él y los locos que profanaron la morada del Omnissiah con sus obscenas blasfemias! Para el último ritual, llamó incluso a uno de los Astartes Herejes que llegaron al manufactorum con el comienzo de los levantamientos. Hizo... algo. Algo terrible. Y solo después de aquello pudieron activar la máquina».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「ファブリケーター・センサーがあの機械を特別視していたこと以外は…よく存じません。彼にとって特別なものであり、万機神の住まいを猥褻な冒涜で汚した狂人たちにとっても特別なものでした！最後の儀式のために、反乱が始まった後に、聖工場にやってきたアスタルテスの異端者を呼んでいました。彼は…何かをしていたんです。何か恐ろしいことを。その後で初めて、彼らは機械のスイッチを入れることができたのです」
languages.original_text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."

traits.locale_text: 「ファブリケーター・センサーがあの機械を特別視していたこと以外は…よく存じません。彼にとって特別なものであり、万機神の住まいを猥褻な冒涜で汚した狂人たちにとっても特別なものでした！最後の儀式のために、反乱が始まった後に、聖工場にやってきたアスタルテスの異端者を呼んでいました。彼は…何かをしていたんです。何か恐ろしいことを。その後で初めて、彼らは機械のスイッチを入れることができたのです」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht viel darüber, aber der Fabricator-Zensor sah in dieser Maschine wohl etwas ... Besonderes. Etwas Besonderes für ihn und die Verrückten, die die Wohnstatt des Omnissiah mit ihrer obszönen Blasphemie besudelt haben! Für das letzte Ritual rief er sogar einen Astartes-Ketzer, der zu Beginn der Aufstände im Manufactorum eintraf. Er ... hat etwas getan. Etwas Schreckliches. Und erst danach konnten sie die Maschine einschalten."
languages.original_text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht viel darüber, aber der Fabricator-Zensor sah in dieser Maschine wohl etwas ... Besonderes. Etwas Besonderes für ihn und die Verrückten, die die Wohnstatt des Omnissiah mit ihrer obszönen Blasphemie besudelt haben! Für das letzte Ritual rief er sogar einen Astartes-Ketzer, der zu Beginn der Aufstände im Manufactorum eintraf. Er ... hat etwas getan. Etwas Schreckliches. Und erst danach konnten sie die Maschine einschalten."
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Je n'en sais guère plus, hormis que le fabricator-censeur accordait une importance particulière à cette machine. Elle avait quelque chose de spécial pour lui et les autres fous qui ont profané la demeure de l'Omnimessie avec leurs blasphèmes obscènes ! Lors du rituel final, il a même fait appel à l'un des hérétiques de l'Astartes qui est arrivé au manufactorum après le début du soulèvement. Il... a fait quelque chose. Quelque chose de terrible. Et ce n'est qu'après qu'ils ont pu mettre la machine en marche. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en sais guère plus, hormis que le fabricator-censeur accordait une importance particulière à cette machine. Elle avait quelque chose de spécial pour lui et les autres fous qui ont profané la demeure de l'Omnimessie avec leurs blasphèmes obscènes ! Lors du rituel final, il a même fait appel à l'un des hérétiques de l'Astartes qui est arrivé au manufactorum après le début du soulèvement. Il... a fait quelque chose. Quelque chose de terrible. Et ce n'est qu'après qu'ils ont pu mettre la machine en marche. »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Tek bildiğim, Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün o makineyi... Özel gördüğüydü. Ona ve Hermesih'in meskenine müstehcen dine aykırılıklarıyla hakaret eden delilere göre özeldi! Son ayin için Astartesli kâfirlerden birini bile çağırmıştı. O da isyanlar başladıktan sonra manufaktoruma gelmişti. Burada... Bir şey yaptı. Çok fena bir şey. Ancak öyle makineyi çalıştırabildiler."
languages.original_text: "I don't know much, except that the Fabricator-Censor saw that machine as... special. It was special to him and to the crazies who defiled the Omnissiah's abode with their obscene blasphemy! For the final ritual, he even called upon one of the Astartes heretics who arrived at the manufactorum after the start of the uprisings. He... did something. Something terrible. And only after that were they able to switch the machine on."

traits.locale_text: “Tek bildiğim, Denetçi Fabrikatör’ün o makineyi... Özel gördüğüydü. Ona ve Hermesih’in meskenine müstehcen kâfirlikleriyle hakaret eden delilere göre özeldi! Son ayin için Astartesli kâfirlerden birini bile çağırmıştı. O da isyanlar başladıktan sonra manufaktoruma gelmişti. Burada... Bir şey yaptı. Çok fena bir şey. Ancak bundan sonra makineyi çalıştırabildiler.”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
